name: NP Rescue Cats
description:
NP RescueCats is a simple cat-matching puzzle game.

Although randomized, unlike many games in this genre, it can always prove that the puzzle is solvable.

v.2.0:  better scaling; now supporting any reasonable screen resolution

currently supports desktop versions of Windows, Windows Phone 8.1+ and amd64 Ubuntu-like OSes

NPRC is entirely free and contains no ads.
